pages.text: Accounts are where your money is stored. Every time you buy or sell an item, the money in your account is added or removed. An account is made of two components, the $(l)player name$() and the $(l)account id$(). For example, your main (personal) account is $(playername):1. Personal accounts cannot be shared with other players. However, you can create a new shared account, which can be shared with other players.

Shared accounts are accounts that multiple players have access to. In order to create a shared account, use the $(n)/shopAccounts createAccount$() command. You can either run the command by itself and it will not add new members, or include the names of other players to add them to the account. Example: $(n)/shopAccounts createAccount $(playername) Friend1 Friend2$()$(br)After this command, you will get the new account's ID.

Now that you have the account and its ID, both you and other members should be able to change the account of a shop/buyer/seller with the "Change Account" button. Keep in mind that the account ID will have the name of the one who created the account, so if you created the account, others will see the shared account as $(playername):(id). To add more members to the account, do $(n)/shopAccounts addMember (id) (newMember)$().
To see all other commands, check out the README at the mod's $(l:https://github.com/AmmoniumX/AdminShopOverhauled)github$().
